actions.name: Singer

cost.trigger: A creature on the field (other than the user) uses a [Sonic] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature on the field (other than the user) uses a [Sonic] attack

Effect: Connection - Sing. The user freely uses the triggering attack as if it was on the user's Active List, selecting new targets as needed.
